entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 14 except 8 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 14 except 8 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Showers beginning this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain showers or flurries. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers beginning in the morning then changing to flurries in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Sunday 7 May 2023
